title: Seeing a prisoner in a dream

preview.html: But interpreters have another opinion, which is that this dream may mean that the dreamer will triumph over his enemy, and it may be a warning sign for the dreamer to avoid committing sins and disobedience, and therefore there is no need to worry if he sees this dream. Interpretation of seeing a prisoner in a dream: It is said that seeing a prisoner in a dream and knowing him It. It could be evidence that he needs the viewer’s help and support, whether material or moral. It is said that seeing a person imprisoned in a dream and knowing him. This may indicate that he is living in great suffering in his life and needs the help of the fortuneteller to pay off the debts he has incurred. Al-Nabulsi says: Seeing a prisoner in a dream may be a sign that the dreamer will get rid of all the people who hold grudges and hate him and oppress them. Al-Nabulsi indicated that seeing the prisoner in the dream was screaming. This is evidence that he wants to tell the dreamer that he is suffering from the injustice that has been done to him. It also indicates the kindness that this person has. Seeing an imprisoned person in a dream being released from prison. This is evidence that the dreamer will be able to get rid of the problems and difficult situations that he suffered from and will start again to compensate for what he lost. We chose for you: Interpretation of seeing prison in Dream Interpretation of a dream about seeing a prisoner in a dream indicates that seeing a prisoner in a dream while the husband was open. That this woman provides help and support to her husband to bear the heavy responsibilities assigned to him. Seeing a prisoner in a dream who was close to him indicates a dream. The viewer feels a lot of suffering in his life and this He makes his feelings mixed as a result of the negative energy that affects him. It is said: seeing a prisoner in a dream and the husband cried. This may be evidence that this husband will be blessed by God Almighty with a lot of goodness and blessings. Interpreters say that seeing a prisoner in a dream. could be evidence of... That the dreamer will remove all his worries and get rid of the state of sadness and anxiety that was controlling him. Seeing a prisoner in a dream. It may be evidence that the dreamer will soon marry a good and righteous girl who will give birth to a just and righteous man in his old age. Interpretation of seeing a prisoner in a dream by Ibn Sirin Ibn Sirin says Seeing a person imprisoned in a dream may be evidence that the dreamer may be exposed to some problems and difficult situations in his life that will make him suffer. She also indicated that seeing a person imprisoned in a dream may be a sign that the dreamer will be exposed to some losses and financial crises that he will suffer from for some. Time. Ibn Sirin said: Seeing a person imprisoned in a dream. It may be a sign that the dreamer is not obligated to perform acts of worship and duties and neglects them, and therefore he must pledge to perform them again. It is said that seeing a person imprisoned in a dream. This may be evidence that the fortuneteller has He marries a girl with a bad reputation who lacks good qualifications and is therefore not worthy of him as a wife and mother to his children. Seeing a prisoner in a dream wearing white clothes means that he is a prisoner of war. That the fortuneteller will be liberated from the obstacles and judgments that burdened him and caused him suffering and sadness. Ibn Sirin said that seeing a man imprisoned

title: What is the interpretation of a dream about climbing to a high position for senior scholars?

preview.html: Interpretation of dreams about climbing to a high place, whether this place is a house, a hill, a mountain, or even a staircase, as we see that this dream arouses the dreamer’s curiosity and we see him searching for the different meanings and meanings of this vision, and in the article it will shed light on this topic and give it more attention. Interpretation of Dreams By climbing to a high place: Dreaming of climbing a high place indicates the high status and position of the dreamer in general, whether that place is a building or any physical appearance such as a mountain, a hill, or other things. If one sees that he is climbing high, this indicates the success and progress that the viewer will achieve, as well as relationships. Successful and correct plans that the viewer aspires to achieve.Interpretation of a dream about climbing a high place by Ibn SirinAccording to Ibn Kathir’s interpretation, a dream about climbing a high place indicates the good things that the dreamer will acquire in the near future, God willing. Interpretation of a dream about climbing a high place indicates the imminent fulfillment of dreams and reaping the fruits that the dreamer has long sought to achieve and did everything valuable and precious to obtain them. Interpretation of a dream about climbing a high place alone. Interpretation of a dream about climbing a high place for individuals indicates success in her life at all levels. If a girl sees An unmarried woman herself climbs to a high position and is happy and cheerful. This indicates the success of the plans she makes for her future, and the vision shows the successive good things that will follow her. Likewise, the vision symbolizes a good psychological state. State and emotional stability, and God knows best. Interpretation of a dream about climbing a high place for a married woman: Seeing a married woman herself climbing a high place indicates her great wisdom, wisdom, and intelligence that will allow her to solve her problems in general and the problems that arose between her and her husband in particular. I got it, and God knows best. If a married woman dreams that she is climbing a high place, this may indicate the success of the child and offspring, and it may also indicate good morals and behavior enjoyed by the dreamer and her family, and God Almighty knows best. Interpretation of a dream of climbing a high place for a pregnant woman. Interpretation of a dream about climbing A high place for a pregnant woman shows the period of pregnancy she is going through and also shows that her birth will be easy thanks to God Almighty, and the vision can indicate her safety from all the difficult health conditions that he may face. If a pregnant woman sees that she is climbing something very high, this symbolizes a male child with permission God, but if the thing you are climbing is not high, it symbolizes a little girl. She is happy with her skin, and sees the safety of the fetus and enjoys its good health. Interpretation of a dream about climbing a high place for a divorced woman. If a divorced woman sees that she is climbing high, this indicates the various circumstances she is going through. It also shows her ability to overcome difficult problems or obstacles in her life. The vision may indicate the ability of the divorced woman to Change obstacles and difficulties. In degrees of success, distinction, and the fulfillment of dreams. If the divorced woman has a son, the vision indicates the justice of this boy and that he will rise to the highest positions, and God Almighty will recognize this son in her eyes.

I got it, and God knows best. If a married woman dreams that she is climbing a high place, this may indicate the success of the child and offspring, and it may also indicate good morals and behavior enjoyed by the dreamer and her family, and God Almighty knows best. Interpretation of a dream about climbing A high place for a pregnant woman shows the period of pregnancy she is going through and also shows that her birth will be easy thanks to God Almighty, and the vision can indicate her safety from all the difficult health conditions that he may face. If a pregnant woman sees that she is climbing something very high, this symbolizes a male child with permission God, but if the thing you are climbing is not high, it symbolizes a little girl. The vision may indicate the ability of the divorced woman to Change obstacles and difficulties. In degrees of success, distinction, and the fulfillment of dreams. If the divorced woman has a son, the vision indicates the justice of this boy and that he will rise to the highest positions, and God Almighty will recognize this son in her eyes.

title: Interpretation of a dream about seeing strong winds in a dream

preview.html: The interpretation of a dream about seeing strong winds in a dream for a single woman, and seeing strong winds indicates a lot of goodness and recovery from illness, and seeing strong winds accompanied by dust indicates turmoil and misfortunes. The wind blows air laden with either dust or gusts, which helps soften and improve the atmosphere. Interpretation of a dream about strong winds: When you see strong winds in a dream, according to Ibn Sirin’s interpretation, this either indicates goodness, or in other cases indicates the outbreak of some problems that will quickly disappear and end. In today's article, we learn about the interpretation of seeing winds in a dream. Interpretation of seeing strong winds in a dream for one girl: If an unmarried girl dreams that she sees strong winds touching the windows of the house and entering the house, this indicates the coming of goodness and happiness for the people of that house. But if the girl sees If a married woman is standing in front of her house on the street and the air is heavy with dust, this indicates the outbreak of strife and disagreements. If an unmarried girl sees that strong winds are entering the house and destroying some things, this indicates that there are some problems in the house, but they will soon leave and end, and joy and happiness will prevail. In the house, and God Almighty is Most High and Most Knowing. Read also: Interpretation of a dream about seeing cold in a dream by Ibn Sirin. Interpretation of seeing strong winds in the house in a dream for a married woman: When a married woman sees the wind entering her house and feels anxious and afraid about that, this indicates that there are some problems that will subside. quickly and has no effect. However, if a married woman sees that a light wind is a breeze blowing into her house. This indicates the alleviation of fears or perhaps indicates the healing of diseases or getting rid of marital problems and conflicts. If a married woman sees that the wind is blowing in her house, she She carries her husband and takes him away. It indicates a trip to another place or perhaps a job promotion. Read also: Interpretation of a dream about seeing clouds in a dream by Ibn Sirin and Imam Al-Sadiq. Interpretation of seeing strong winds in the house in a dream for a man and its meaning: When a person sees that strong winds are carrying him and transporting him from a place To another. This indicates the peak of his power and that he will lead and lead some people as well. But if a man sees that he sees strong winds carrying heavy rain. This indicates the appearance of some happy surprises that bring good news and happiness. If a man sees that the wind enters his house and carries dust and dirt This indicates the presence of some problems, which will disappear quickly, and if the wind in the dream leaves traces in their place, then these problems leave behind some traces. But if he sees that the wind is swirling in the village and suddenly calms down, then this indicates the presence of strife, but it will quickly disappear. And it ends. Read also: Interpretation of seeing dust in a dream by Ibn Sirin. The meaning of seeing strong winds in the house in a pregnant woman’s dream and its interpretation: If the pregnant woman sees that her house is full of strong winds and she does not know where these winds are coming from and without any damage to the house. This indicates the outbreak of some problems that will end. Quickly and disappear. Seeing winds and storms in a married woman’s dream is evidence of...

title: Interpretation of seeing a black scorpion in a dream

preview.html: Interpretation of seeing a black scorpion in a dream by roy2a.com, a person may feel anxious and afraid when he sees a black scorpion in a dream and makes him search for its meanings and what if it is good or bad in a dream, and today through this article we will provide you with the interpretation of seeing a black scorpion in a dream for great interpreters such as Ibn Sirin, Ibn Katheer and other dream interpretation scholars, follow us. Interpretation of seeing a black scorpion in a dream by Ibn Sirin Ibn Sirin interpreted seeing a black scorpion in a dream, which indicates spreading bad and false talk about the dreamer or being the one who says this talk about others. Seeing the killing of a black scorpion in a dream It indicates the dreamer's ability to overcome all the bad things in his life. Interpretation of seeing a black scorpion in a dream by Imam Al-Sadiq Imam Al-Sadiq interpreted seeing a black scorpion in a dream It shows that some bad things happen in the dreamer's life. Seeing a black scorpion coming out of an area of ​​​​the body in a dream It indicates that the dreamer is doing some wrong things in his life and needs to be careful and vigilant. Black scorpion in a dream It indicates an abundance of envy and haters in the dreamer's life. See other interpretations: Interpretation of seeing a scorpion in Dream Interpretation of seeing a black scorpion in a dream for a single woman Seeing a single black scorpion in a dream and remembering that bad things are said about her behind her back, and God knows best. The black scorpion in a single woman's dream shows that she is facing many crises and problems in her life and feels stressed and anxious about it. Seeing a black scorpion student in a dream indicates that she will be exposed to a major failure in her academic life. A black scorpion in the house of an unmarried woman in a dream indicates the end of all problems and crises in her life. Interpretation of seeing a black scorpion in a dream for a married woman Seeing a married black scorpion in a dream indicates the many disagreements and problems between her and her husband, which may lead to divorce. A black scorpion in the bed in a dream for a married woman indicates that another woman is approaching her husband, and God knows best. Seeing a married black scorpion in a dream says that her husband will face great financial difficulties in the near future. See other interpretations: Interpretation of seeing a tattoo in a dream Interpretation of seeing a black scorpion in a dream for a pregnant woman Seeing a pregnant black scorpion in a dream indicates that she will face some health problems during pregnancy, and God knows best. A black scorpion in a dream for a pregnant woman indicates that she is exposed to some crises with those close to her, and God knows best I know. Seeing a pregnant black scorpion in a dream indicates that she is going through a bad period and feels very tired and exhausted. The scorpion in a dream for a pregnant woman may also indicate that she will give birth to a male, and God knows best. Interpretation of seeing a black scorpion in a dream for a man The black scorpion in a dream for a man indicates many worries and anxiety in his life during this period. Seeing a black scorpion in a dream indicates the possibility of being exposed to some material losses during this period. The black scorpion in a dream for a man may indicate that bad things will happen in life

title: Interpretation of seeing a husband marrying his wife again in a dream

preview.html: I likeFansSubscribersFansInterpretation of a dream about a husband marrying his wife in a dream. Recently, many, varied, and multiple interpretations have appeared, so when you are looking for an interpretation and meaning of your dream, it must come from a reliable source and that the husband loves, respects, and respects her.Interpretation of a dream about a husband marrying his pregnant wife.I saw in my dream that I will marry my wife to a beautiful woman.It is It symbolizes that it is a good vision that shows the safety of the woman and her child. If a man sees in a dream, marrying another woman, but she is not beautiful and has an ugly nature, which in reality shows his wife’s health crises during pregnancy. As for the vision? The woman’s marriage to her partner. If someone else dies, then this Evidence of the fulfillment of the desires and goals sought by the partner. Interpretation of a woman remarrying her husband: It heralds the birth of a new child and the addition of a new child to the family or family. These are good visions, and they are strong evidence of hearing news that satisfies the heart, and it has happened for a while. If a woman has a son Male and with this vision she will be very happy on this son’s wedding day. Likewise, a man’s dream of marrying another woman promises that he will have multiple and advanced opportunities in his life, and a change in work and family status. This dream symbolizes receiving multiple blessings and graces and bringing them to kindness and positivity. Guide Beautiful love for a wife to a partner who had feelings, friendship and mutual respect between them. When a trader or worker sees this dream, this is a strong indication that you will earn huge amounts of money in a short period of time. The interpretation of seeing a husband marrying his wife in a dream expresses overcoming life’s crises and difficulties and immediate satisfaction of desires. Evidence of The high status of the husband means that he will gain a prominent position and importance. It announces good offspring and decisions regarding children and evidence of affection and love between the two partners. A dream about a young married man promising victory over his opponent, but if he dreams that he is marrying an old man, an old man, then this is a sign of the husband’s abundance of luck. Interpretation of a dream about a husband marrying a second: The vision is auspicious and facilitated by the grace of God, and abundant nourishment from God. As for the one who dreams of getting married while she is a widow, this is bad luck for her, or her lack of age, or her poverty and need for money. Seeing a sick person symbolizes recovery from illness and enjoyment of good health and well-being. I think In that a lot of marriage to another man comes from the subconscious and has no basis in reality. But if a woman sees that she is marrying an old man, this is a sign of joy and a lot of sustenance, and good solutions come from different doors. Interpretation of a dream about a husband marrying another woman for a married woman: It symbolizes many Goods that the couple will receive in the future. He is lucky if this woman is beautiful. But if he sees in his dream that he married her in an unacceptable way, then this promises hardships, difficulties and disagreements in his family life. The emergence of many positive and good changes in the lives of both partners. Perhaps he is overthinking an issue or subconsciously. For him. If the dreamer’s woman is pregnant, God will grant her a healthy fetus, regardless of whether it is male or female. Interpretation of a husband’s dream about marrying a woman.

title: Interpretation of bran in a dream and bran flour in a dream

preview.html: The concept of sifting flour, flour, and wheat and barley bran. Interpretation of bran in a dream. Bran indicates the difficulty of life and its interpretation is poverty, poverty, and weakness. Bran in an unmarried girl’s dream symbolizes a little luck in profit or money, and eating it indicates trouble and some anxiety, and it is not good to buy it or share it in dreams. Because it can represent separation and abandonment. Bran in a married woman’s dream symbolizes scarcity of resources and lack of spending. It is not good to eat them or make bread from them, as this can express extreme poverty and need for others. Bran is also a symbol of weakness, weakness, body problems and heartbreak.Bran in a man's dream is bad. If a person sees in his dream that he uses it as fodder for animals or chickens and does not see himself eating from it, then his interpretation is likely to be good, and the dream may indicate gradual transformations towards a better life or livelihood. Explanation of seeing flour - YouTube

title: Interpretation of chocolate in a dream in detail

preview.html: We present to you in detail the interpretation of chocolate in a dream, among dreams, visions and dreams. Many people search for the meanings and connotations of the events they see during their sleep. Humans tend to reveal everything that is mysterious and find out the topics that contain unknown secret and hidden topics, to find out what they mean and what they indicate events that will happen in real life. Chocolate is considered one of the delicious and sweet foods that adults and children accept because of the happiness they feel when eating it. And some consider chocolate a symbol of romance and love, so you find that many lovers gift each other a luxury bouquet of chocolates as an expression of love. But what does it mean to see chocolate in a dream? Is it a pleasant thing or portends sorrow and sorrow? We will learn this in the following article from the Encyclopedia. Titled “Interpretation of Chocolate in a Dream”.Interpretation of Chocolate in a DreamThe Symbol of Chocolate in a DreamThe Islamic translator Ibn Sirin indicated that seeing chocolate in a dream is one of the good things that it is advisable to see in a dream, so distributing chocolate in a dream comes to indicate the spread of warm feelings and love. Good news and happy occasions arrive for the dreamer. Whoever sees in his dream that he is eating a piece of chocolate, this is an indication that the dreamer will get a lot of nutrition without making any hard effort, while whoever sees himself buying chocolate, this is a sign that he will meet someone new. And they become close friends. Interpretation of seeing chocolate for a single woman: Chocolate comes in the dream of an unmarried girl, and heralds a happy occasion for her soon, such as engagement or marriage, and seeing white or dark chocolate indicates that she is going through a state of emotional happiness. If the unmarried woman sees herself eating sweet and delicious chocolate , she will get engaged or get married soon, and when an unmarried woman sees someone giving her chocolate as a gift, this is a sign that she will marry this person in reality. Whereas if an unmarried woman sees someone stealing her chocolate, this is a warning that something bad and unpleasant will happen to her, such as losing her lover or Annulment of her engagement. Interpretation of seeing chocolate for a married woman: Seeing chocolate in a pregnant woman’s dream brings a lot of good news. When a pregnant woman sees someone giving her chocolate, this is a sign that she will soon become pregnant. Whereas if she sees a dead person giving her chocolate in a dream, she will soon have a home. New. Also, if a married woman sees in her dream that she is eating chocolate, she will receive money equal to the amount of chocolate she ate. But if a married woman sees someone stealing her chocolate, this means that there is a major quarrel between her and her husband that may lead to divorce, and God knows best. Interpretation of seeing chocolate. For a pregnant womanIf someone is seen giving a pregnant woman chocolate while she is sleeping, this shows the gender of her fetus, and if someone gives her white chocolate, she will give birth to a girl, while if dark chocolate is given, she will give birth to a boy. To see

title: Interpretation of dough in a dream Kneading flour in a dream

preview.html: The dream of dough is for the single person, for the married woman, for the pregnant woman, for the divorced woman, whether it is cutting leavened dough by hand, rolling the dough, baking bread according to Ibn Sirin, and more. Interpretation of dough in a dream: Dough in a dream is honest money in trade and trading, from which the dreamer will reap a large and immediate profit if he sees that it is leavened, even if it is not leavened. It is corruption and hardship in money, and if the dough spoils in the dream, then it is money on the verge of loss or bankruptcy. Whoever sees in his dream that he is kneading barley flour, then he is a believer, and he has status, money, or success in his waking life. Interpretation of dough in a dream for a married womanA married woman who sees in Her dream is that she is making dough and looks like it with her hand, then this is interpreted as a good deed or a good deed that she does for the benefit of her parents, her husband, or her children. Whoever sees the dough ripening until it becomes bread and is eaten by her family, friends, or guests, then she bears a great responsibility and will be rewarded with the best reward. The best dough in The dream is dough made from wheat, barley, or wheat flour. It is praiseworthy to see the white color in the dough pure and pure, because this expresses the woman’s generosity and high morals. The more the volume and thickness of the dough increases during fermentation, this indicates abundance and goodness. It is recommended in the visions to keep the dough in the refrigerator Because this is an expression of safe and preserved money. Interpretation of dough in an unmarried woman’s dream: If a girl sees that she is preparing or making dough from wheat, barley or wheat flour, and in the dream she feels that her dough is ready and has been fermented and it is time to put it in the oven to become bread. The dream is an indicator of optimism and success, and sometimes the cohesive dough intersects over the nail or profit, and the achievement of goals and good intentions. The best color of the dough in the visions is pure white because it is an expression of purity and moral and spiritual sublimity. In the visions, it is not worth eating the dough raw, because this expresses regret after haste. The good thing is that the dough tastes sweet and is ready for cakes and sweets, and this is an expression of joy, happiness, and happiness. It is said that bread dough is sustenance, and it is said that sweet dough is joy or marriage. Everything related to flour, bread, and dough in a pregnant woman’s dreams is a good omen and a sign of goodness and blessing. Interpretation of dough in a dream for a pregnant womanIf the woman sees A pregnant woman is that she kneads flour or flour, and makes it a white and clean dough, then this is her interpretation of a very happy event. If the dough has matured and fermented and is ready to be baked or put in the oven or oil, then this is an interpretation of the approaching date of birth. The pregnant woman must prepare and prepare well for it. It is not worth the interpretation to eat the dough Unless its taste is sweet, then this may confuse the dreamer’s speed or speed. Interpretation of cutting dough in a dream Cutting dough into small discs is something that the interpretation praised because it expresses great skill in managing money, and this interpretation applies to both women and men. Interpretation of preparing dough In a dream, leaven is a person’s consciousness, intention, and goal, unleavened bread is slow to arrange, and leaven is in a critical situation. Seeing dough in a dream means that you expect comfort (concerned, imprisoned, and

title: Interpretation of seeing a friend in a dream by Ibn Sirin

preview.html: Interpretation of seeing a friend in a dream by Ibn Sirin: A friend in a person’s life is considered the other who his mother did not give birth to. Extreme fear when he sees his friend in an unexpected or frightening situation, so people turn to interpreters to find out the meaning and interpretation of their dreams, so in this article today we will learn about Ibn Sirin’s interpretation of seeing a friend in a dream. Seeing a friend in a dream Interpretation by Ibn Sirin Ibn Sirin believes that seeing a friend in A dream is one of the visions that carries many connotations, and the good and evil in these connections differ depending on the condition of the friend in the dream. Among the most important of these issues and their implications: Whoever sees one of his close friends in his dream, this is an indication that the dreamer carries within him many feelings, but does not reveal them despite his desire to speak. As for seeing a friend smiling in a dream, it is evidence of the friend visiting the fortune teller himself, or an indication that A lot of good news is on its way to the fortuneteller, by God’s will and success, and God knows best. . While seeing a close friend crying in a dream symbolizes that this friend is suffering from distress and a major problem that is bothering him, and he needs his close friend to stand by him and strengthen his resolve, and God is Most High and He knows best. But when the dreamer sees in a dream that he has lost his friend, this is one of the ugly and unpleasant visions that commentators avoid interpreting. Interpretation of seeing childhood friends. Ibn Sirin believes that seeing childhood friends in the dreamer’s dream is a sign of the dreamer’s desire to return to those days or go back in time. Backward. This is an indication that the pressures to which the dreamer was exposed were beginning to exceed his ability to withstand. Also, seeing childhood friends in a dream symbolizes that the dreamer feels weak and that there are many friends beside him and around him and standing behind him, and God is Most High and Most Knowing. Interpretation of seeing classmates as Seeing friends at work or studying in the dreamer’s dream carries many indications of the dreamer’s feeling of depression and loneliness during this time and his tendency to withdraw and stay away from those around him, and God is Most High and All-Knowing. Interpretation of seeing old friends: Ibn Sirin believes that seeing the dreamer’s old friends indicates longing. The dreamer is for pleasure, psychological comfort, reassurance, longing for play, and a period free of worries and difficulties. But if the dreamer goes through a difficult time in an accident, seeing old friends in a dream means that the dreamer will spend that time in peace and will return to his psychological and mental clarity very soon, and God is Great. High, as you know. Interpretation of dreams for a single woman’s friend. Ibn Sirin interpreted seeing a girl who did not marry a friend in a dream, but with a dignified, kind, and elegant appearance, as evidence of the happy news that is on her way, and God is Most High and All-Knowing. While an unmarried man seeing her friend who was rude and inappropriate is an indication that the girl will hear a lot of bad news, God forbid. An ugly friend in a girl’s dream indicates the failure that will surround the girl, whether it is in a romantic relationship, engagement, or work. It is a habit. Seeing a close friend in a dream symbolizes love and affection

title: Interpretation of a dream about plums in a dream

preview.html: Interpretation of seeing plums in a dream: Red plums are an indication of abundance of nourishment and goodness. In addition, plums show loss of anxiety and peace of mind. You may also know the toilet in a dream, as plums are among the fruits that can be seen in a dream and are among the things that bring goodness to the fortuneteller, because plums It is one of the fruits that provide the human body with important and necessary nutrients, and through this article we will show you a series of multiple interpretations of this vision, so follow us. Interpretation of seeing plums in a dream The interpretation of a dream about red plums in a dream carries many connotations and signs, which vary depending on what one sees. The interpretations were as follows: Seeing fresh red plums in a dream means that the person has good qualities and gets many good things in his life. Also, the dream of eating peaches is an indication that the person is persistent and insists on the success that he will achieve soon. Read also: Interpretation of a vision A dream about pregnancy for a virgin girl in a dream. Interpretation of a dream about plums in a dream for a single woman. After knowing the interpretation of seeing plums in a dream, dream interpretation scholars have confirmed that this dream has several connotations and signs that differed according to the scene of the viewer. Continued: Seeing a red plum in an engaged girl’s dream is a sign that her wedding date is approaching. Likewise, if the girl is single and not engaged, this is a sign that her wedding date is approaching, and God knows best. Also, seeing an unmarried girl with a red plum is not recent, so this is evidence On lack of experience in life or lack of passion in one of the relationships with which you are connected. Interpretation of a dream about plums by Imam Al-SadiqImam Al-Sadiq explained several interpretations of this vision, which appeared along the lines of the following: To dream of a pregnant plum is a sign that she will have a son, who will have many in Life and everyone will respect him, and God knows best. Also, dreaming of eating plums in a dream, and its taste is delicious and sweet, is also considered a sign of success and excellence that he will achieve in life. Likewise, if you eat plums in a dream and its taste is not delicious, then this is a vision that indicates problems and difficulties in life or Constant fear and anxiety about some things, and God knows best. If seeing plums is at the time of planting and harvesting, then this is a dream that indicates many good things to come, God willing. Interpretation of a dream of plums in a dream for a married woman because he knows. Interpretation of seeing plums in a dream. Seeing plums in a dream for a married woman for him. There are many interpretations and associations, and we mention the most important of them: If a married woman sees in a dream that she ate a lot of fruit and its size was large, then it is a vision that indicates that the married woman will receive huge sums of money in exchange for some successful projects, and God knows best. Also, seeing plums in a dream that are out of season, is a sign of kindness returning to the dreamer. If a married woman eats plums in a dream, this is good news about success and a great diet for her husband. Seeing green plums in a dream is evidence of peace of mind and happiness.
